thread.title: Billboard Ranked No. 1 U.S. Brand on Twitter
thread.title_full: Billboard Ranked No. 1 U.S. Brand on Twitter

title: Billboard Ranked No. 1 U.S. Brand on Twitter
text:
Billboard Ranked No. 1 U.S. Brand on Twitter 
Billboard Biz Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Leading social media benchmarking and predictive analytics firm?Shareablee?Inc.?released the Top 25 Social U.S. Brands in Q3 2015 --?and?Billboard?was named the leading U.S. brand on Twitter with 6.1 million engaged actions in Q3. 
Measuring engagement between July 1 and Sept. 30, 2015,?Billboard?beat out the number two brand, the NFL, by 900,000 Twitter actions. The rest of the top five included ESPN,?BuzzFeed?and MTV. 
Follow?Billboard?on...
